select umb.*,s.store_name from member_user_money_bill umb left join member_store_info s ON s.store_id=umb.store_id where umb.deleted =0 and umb.user_id=#{reqVO.userId}
and DATE_FORMAT(umb.create_time, '%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{reqVO.startTime}, '%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(umb.create_time, '%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{reqVO.endTime}, '%Y%m%d')
order by umb.create_time desc
select * from member_user_money_bill where deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and locate(#{orderNo}, `remark`) > 0 and type = 3
